cx-desc: Ae tuill that permits eeditors tae owerset pages fae yin leid intil anither wi the heelp o machine owersetin n ither owersetin tuils
cx-special-login-error: Ye maun be loggit in fer tae owerset in this page.
cx-tools-instructions-text2: Ye dinna need tae eik thaim aw
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Autæmatic owersetin is uisefu but ye'll need tae clean up some mistaks tae mak it just richt.
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Whan ye'r happie wi the ootcome, press {{int:cx-publish-button}}.
